cause.description:
LifeLine saves lives EVERY DAY! With LifeLine, adults with mental illness will no longer slip through the cracks of a system that excludes them because of their inability to pay for needed services. It will provide immediate access to treatment The program will serve hundreds annually.
1. Mental illness is the second-leading cause of disability and premature mortality in the U.S.
2. It is estimated that more than one-third of homeless individuals suffer from mental illness.
cause.mission: Improving the lives of the people we serve
cause.name: LifeLine
